title: SmartStore
short-description: Scale to exponentially growing volumes of machine data by scaling compute and storage independently, while achieving high availability, longer data retention and significant TCO reduction.

title: Workload Management
short-description: Policy-based mechanism to reserve system resources -CPU & memory, for critical workloads and guard against excessive resource usage leading to more predictability in meeting business SLAs.

title: Dashboard Dark Mode
short-description: Dark theme support with dashboards for optimized display on NOC, SOC, and overhead monitor walls.

title: Splunk Metrics Workspace
short-description: Easily visualize analytics for metrics and accelerated datasets, without the need for any SPL.

title: Log to Metrics
short-description: Convert logs containing metric data into discrete metrics data points at index-time.

title: Splunk on Docker Support
short-description: Easily scale Splunk deployments on containerized infrastructures while lowering the total cost of ownership.

title: Machine Learning Toolkit 3.3, 3.4, and 4.0
short-description: Introducing our new Splunk Community for MLTK Algorithms on GitHub, Splunk MLTK Connector for Apache Spark™, Splunk MLTK Container for TensorFlow™, pre-processing with TF-IDF, Python for Scientific Computing Update, new algorithms, and much more.

title: Guided Data Onboarding
short-description: Guidance on how to ingest top data sources into a specific Splunk deployment environment.

title: Splunk Component Monitoring via REST Endpoints
short-description: New alerting capabilities and support for new features - Search Head Clustering and Index Processor.

title: Accessibility Enhancements
short-description: Usability improvements addressing US Federal Government 508 standard and Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.

title: Splunk Cloud™ Dynamic Data: Active Archive
short-description: Easily and cost effectively retain data for long term to meet regulatory and compliance requirements. Cloud only.
